subject: Hi, folks
msgSnippet: I ve just joined this group. I ve been interested in spelling reform for a number of years now, and have been looking around at the different alternatives. A
messageBody:
I've just joined this group. I've been interested in spelling reform
for a number of years now, and have been looking around at the
different alternatives. A couple of years ago, I got interested in
Shavian, and some time after that Quikscript.

Some of you may know my name. I see a couple of familiar names in
here, possible from alt.language.english.spelling.reform. I was the
one who created the Shaw Script font, and the Rosetta phonetic
translator.

I look forward to Reading (pun) with you!

Andy Callaway

I've just joined this group. I've been interested in spelling reform 
for a number of years now, and have been looking around at the 
different alternatives. A couple of years ago, I got interested in 
Shavian, and some time after that Quikscript.

Some of you may know my name. I see a couple of familiar names in 
here, possible from alt.language.english.spelling.reform. I was the 
one who created the Shaw Script font, and the Rosetta phonetic 
translator.

I look forward to Reading (pun) with you!

Andy Callaway
